welcome_message_body: Welcome to Bagh Na Mohra, Pakistan! Get ready to be enchanted by the city's beautiful mountain landscapes, rich cultural heritage, and warm hospitality. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that this charming city has to offer.

restaurants.name: Al Kausar Resturant
restaurants.description: Al Kausar Resturant is a cafeteria located in the city.

restaurants.name: OPTP - One Potato Two Potato
restaurants.description: OPTP - One Potato Two Potato is a fast food restaurant located in Gūjar Khān.

restaurants.name: La Perla III
restaurants.description: La Perla III is a mexican restaurant located in the city.

restaurants.name: Samiullah Shinwari Restaurant
restaurants.description: Samiullah Shinwari Restaurant is a pakistani restaurant located in راولپنڈی.

restaurants.name: Ajwa Bakers & Restaurant
restaurants.description: Ajwa Bakers & Restaurant is a pakistani restaurant located in Gūjar Khān.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Islamabad International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal dedicated to handling domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
